entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:16 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -36.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 07:51 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -36.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -41.1°C
Wind: WNW 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 34. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 63 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 32.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 59 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
